title: Lincoln's WARNING #100048: Economic Recession Warnings
script: Listen carefully... They're not reporting economic recession warnings—they're performing it. Each fear, each outrage, another coin in their slot machine. The news doesn't inform you. It trains you. Break free. Bitcoin below. Listen up. Economic Recession Warnings... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
